title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Jul 1 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Jul 1 2022
description:
Biden Regime: High gas prices are saving democracy. SCOTUS ruling against EPA will rein in damaging leftist policies. Hillary says asking if she'll endorse Biden in 2024 is a "silly question." Clay and Buck are okay with calling Independence Day the 4th of July -- and with American flag bikinis. Clay also says: "As we head into July  4th weekend, I bet we're not gonna get an update on the 16 cents the Biden administration was bragging they saved us last year." Convicted thief Rex Chapman spews racism at Clarence Thomas. C&B on fancy dress codes brought to mind by their beginning-of-summer travel plans.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
